title: 7-hour power cuts announced for Tuesday (29)
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Many areas in Sri Lanka will experience 7-hour power outages on Tuesday (29) said the Public Utilities Commission of Sri Lanka.
Click here to check at what time you will experience a power cut.
